Description: Six oblate and short barrel beads of amethyst.
Curator's comments: These beads come from an important burial of the Second Intermediate Period. Bibliography: T. E. Peet, ‘The Cemeteries of Abydos, part II. 1911-12’ (London, 1914), 57 describes the contents of tomb B 13, but no mention is made of these beads.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (571)
